works.description:
An article on humidity damage. I created 

it, and it is on my website, Ezine Articles and other article directories.

The article has been taken and very slightly and poorly spun (but still  
turns up in google when some of the article such as the first paragraph is
 
phrase searched).

The blog in question that is using it has not posted the un edited
original  
and included the required links to co operate with Ezine's ToS, and the  
blog has taken it off my site without permission, and using it on a blog  
that has been monetized.
